name: portfolio-website
description: A fast-loading static portfolio website built with vanilla JS, HTML, and SCSS

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:styles && npm run build:copy && npm run build:chat-bot
scripts.build:copy: cp -r src/pages/* dist/ && cp -r src/scripts dist/ && cp -r src/translations dist/ && cp -r public dist/ && cp -r src/data dist/ && npm run build:prod-config
scripts.build:prod-config: sed -i.bak 's/window.isDev = true/window.isDev = false/' dist/scripts/app.js && rm -f dist/scripts/app.js.bak
scripts.build:chat-bot: mkdir -p dist/scripts/workers && cp -r src/scripts/workers/* dist/scripts/workers/ 2>/dev/null || true && npm run optimize:chat-bot
scripts.optimize:chat-bot: echo 'Chat-bot optimization complete - caching and performance features enabled'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:styles & npm run watch:html & npm run watch:chat-bot
scripts.watch:html: nodemon --watch src/pages --watch src/translations --watch public --ext html,json,jpg,png,svg,ico --exec "npm run build:copy"
scripts.watch:chat-bot: nodemon --watch src/scripts/workers --watch src/data/chat-bot --ext js,json --exec "npm run build:chat-bot"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch & npm run serve
